## clockwise2 variable

Returns true, if the triangle `a`<!-- -->, `b`<!-- -->, `c` is in clockwise order, i.e. if `corner2(a,b,c)` returned -1.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clockwise2: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, c: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, eps?: number) => boolean
```
